timeline.bodyText: @vietj Hi Julien - it looks good, can this base class include provider now ?
timeline.author: sberyozkin

replies.bodyText: yes, but how can we test it ?
replies.author: vietj

replies.bodyText: I think you can use "jce" as provider to load a jceks file. Although this provider is always present if I'm not mistaken.
replies.author: pmlopes

replies.bodyText: ok, I'll have a look, perhaps we can write an integration test with a mock provider that delegates to JCE ?
replies.author: vietj

replies.bodyText: it is actually used KeyStore.getInstance("JKS").getProvider().getName() that returns the SUN value
replies.author: vietj

timeline.message: Make KeyStoreOptions independant from JksOptions and PfxOptions, it gets also now a provider property to load KeyStoreOptions with a specific provider

timeline.author: pmlopes
